description: Surface per-change test status in the Researcher Changelog and show verification details on click.

changes.description: show Tested badge + verification details in changelog

details.summary_simple: Changelog entries now surface whether a change was tested (PASS/FAIL/Not tested) and show the recorded test steps in the expanded details view.

steps: Confirm each change shows Tested: PASS / Tested: FAIL / Not tested as expected.
Expand a change and confirm the Verification section shows result + steps.
